title: varam vENDinEn
sahitya:
varam vENDinEn gurunAthanE vAyAra unnai vAzhtti vaNangum


anupallavi

  sura nAda vINai kuzhal maddaLam kuraluDan kUDik-kuzhaindu magizhndE


caraNam    tAi mulaiyuNNum sEyinaip-pOla taN kaDaluNNum koNmUvaip-pOla
pAi malaiyATrin pATTinaip-pOla pAlum tEnum pAghum pazharasamum pOla
kAlamellAm un inbak-kAviyattil Avi magizha AlaDiyin aNNalE shuddhAnanda sutantarattin
